title: Wave Apps
description: Wave Apps features a calming palette of ocean-inspired colors. The primary dark shade '1C2D37' is complemented by vibrant accents: '4EC7C4' reflects a wave's crest, '00959F' captures the depth of the sea, and '3B9BCC' mirrors the clear sky. These hues are visible across their digital platforms and promotional materials, epitomizing their brand identity.
